attributes.action: NATIONALISATION OF GAS AND ELECTRICITY UTILITIES
attributes.additional_details:
ALL GAS GOES THROUGH THE PIPEWORK NETWORK TO OUR HOMES, THERE IS NO SUPER GAS OR PREMIUM GAS ,IT IS JUST GAS, AND YET THE BIG COMPANIES HAVE HUNDREDS OF TARIFFS FOR THE SAME COMMODITY THEY SAY THEY HAVE BOUGHT, ELECTRICITY IS GENERATED AT THE POWER STATIONS AND I AM PRETTY SURE THE PRICE OF A KILOWATT WOULD BE THE SAME PRICE ALL OVER THE COUNTRY,SO WHY IS THERE DIFFERING PRICES AND TARIFFS
I WOULD REQUIRE THE INDUSTRIES TO HAVE SET TARIFFS FOR GAS AND ELECTRIC THROUGHOUT THE COUNTRY SET BY A GOVERNMENT DEPARTMENT SO NO-ONE IN THIS COUNTRY IS RIPPED OFF
